mapper.select: SELECT grade_man_code , mr_name , test_number , grade_man_score , grade_man_reg_date FROM wt_member_registration INNER join wt_grade_management on wt_member_registration.mr_id = wt_grade_management.mr_id INNER JOIN wt_grade_num ON. wt_grade_num.grade_test_num = wt_grade_management.test_round ORDER by wt_grade_management.grade_man_code ASC;

SELECT grade_man_code , mr_name , test_number , grade_man_score , grade_man_reg_date FROM wt_member_registration INNER join wt_grade_management on wt_member_registration.mr_id = wt_grade_management.mr_id INNER JOIN wt_grade_num ON. wt_grade_num.grade_test_num = wt_grade_management.test_round where grade_man_code = #{gradeManCode};

SELECT grade_man_code , mr_name , test_number , grade_man_score , grade_man_reg_date FROM wt_member_registration INNER join wt_grade_management on wt_member_registration.mr_id = wt_grade_management.mr_id INNER JOIN wt_grade_num ON. wt_grade_num.grade_test_num = wt_grade_management.test_round WHERE ${lecGd} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{lecGds},'%');

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT max(CAST(SUBSTRING(grade_man_code,6) AS DECIMAL))+1 FROM wt_grade_management),1) AS max;

lec_number , lec_designation , lec_group_id , lec_group_name , lec_group_sort , lec_starttime , lec_endtime , lec_grading_std , qs_sd_score FROM wt_lec_resource;
